The Future's So Bright, I Gotta Wear ShadesI apologize for this commit message but cylon-specs + this was just too perfect.Anyways, have gotten Cylon robot specs working now. For some reason by the timethe spec runner gets around to running cylon.spec, inside cylon.js Robot hasbeen redefined to an empty object '{}'.This resulted in a "TypeError: object is not a function on constructor" error.So to solve this I moved the require() for 'robot' inside the Cylon.robot()method. This shouldn't reload code thanks to Node's require cache, but willproperly assign Robot when instantiating a new one.
